objectives: Next-generation blockchain and decentralized finance features
Advanced ritual tokenization and NFT marketplace
Advanced DeFi protocols for ritual economy
Advanced ritual governance tokens and DAO
Advanced ritual staking and yield farming

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual tokenization and NFT marketplace
tasks.requirements: Create advanced ritual tokenization and NFT marketplace with cultural authenticity verification.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual derivatives and synthetic assets
tasks.requirements: Create advanced ritual derivatives and synthetic assets for cultural value representation.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual automated market making
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced ritual automated market making for cultural asset liquidity.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual oracles and data feeds
tasks.requirements: Create advanced ritual oracles and data feeds for cultural information verification.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual identity and reputation systems
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced ritual identity and reputation systems for cultural credibility.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual privacy and zero-knowledge proofs
tasks.requirements: Create advanced ritual privacy and zero-knowledge proofs for cultural data protection.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual scalability and layer 2 solutions
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced ritual scalability and layer 2 solutions for high-volume cultural transactions.
Create advanced ritual interoperability standards for cross-platform cultural exchange.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual audit and security frameworks
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced ritual audit and security frameworks for cultural asset protection.
